//You only fail when you stop trying...
#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define inf 1000000000000
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(v) v.begin(),v.end()
#define S second
#define F first
#define boost1 ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
#define boost2 cin.tie(0);
#define mem(a,val) memset(a,val,sizeof a)
#define endl "\n"
#define maxn 100001

ll a[maxn],bit[maxn+5];
void update(ll ind,ll val) 
{
    while(ind<=maxn)
    {
        bit[ind]+=val;
        ind+=(ind&-ind);
    }
}
ll query(ll ind)
{
    ll sum=0;
    while(ind>0)
    {
        sum+=bit[ind];
        ind-=(ind&-ind);
    }
    return sum;
}

int main()
{
	boost1;boost2;	
	ll i,j,n,t,inv,f,ctr,k;
	cin>>t;
	ctr=0;
	while(t--)
	{
		ctr++;
		cin>>n>>k;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		mem(bit,0);
		inv=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			inv+=query(maxn-1)-query(a[i]);
			update(a[i],1);
		}
		if(k<=inv)
		{
			cout<<"Case"<<" "<<ctr<<":"<<" "<<inv-k<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		if((inv-k)%2==0)
		{
			cout<<"Case"<<" "<<ctr<<":"<<" "<<0<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		sort(a+1,a+n+1);
		f=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]==a[i+1])
			f=1;
		}
		if(f)
		cout<<"Case"<<" "<<ctr<<":"<<" "<<0<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"Case"<<" "<<ctr<<":"<<" "<<1<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
